# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/tomli/_types.py
@source-hash: f864c6d9552a929c
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:47Z

## Primary Purpose
Type definition module for the tomli TOML parser library. Defines core type aliases used throughout the parser implementation to ensure type safety and code clarity.

## Key Type Definitions
- **ParseFloat** (L8): Type alias for callable that converts string to Any type, used for custom float parsing functions
- **Key** (L9): Type alias for tuple of strings representing hierarchical TOML keys (e.g., nested table paths)
- **Pos** (L10): Type alias for int representing parser position/offset within input text

## Dependencies
- **typing** module (L5): Imports Any, Callable, Tuple for type annotation support

## Architectural Notes
- Follows standard Python type annotation patterns with meaningful aliases
- Part of tomli's type system design for parsing TOML documents
- Supports customizable float parsing through ParseFloat callable interface
- Key structure allows representation of nested TOML sections like `[section.subsection]`
